mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.FILE_PATH, B.FILE_NAME FROM TB_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROFILE_INFO B ON B.IDX_USER=A.IDX_USER WHERE A.USER_ID=#{user_id}
SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
SELECT * FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_NAME=#{user_name} AND USER_PHONE=#{user_phone}

SELECT user_id ,user_name ,mphone_num FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by #{order_field} DESC) AS row_num ,user_id ,user_name ,mphone_num FROM TB_USER WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page_num}*#{amount} ) WHERE row_num > (#{page_num} -1)*#{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_TYPE = #{user_type} ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USER_NAME, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_PHONE, PRIVACY_TERMS, SERVICE_USE_TERMS, PROFILE_Y, EQ_TYPE01, EQ_TYPE02 ) VALUES ( #{user_name}, #{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_phone}, #{privacy_terms}, #{service_use_terms}, #{profile_y}, #{eq_type01}, #{eq_type02} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER SET LAST_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT idx_user FROM TB_USER WHERE user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT A.*, IFNULL(B.FILE_PATH, '') AS FILE_PATH, IFNULL(B.FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME FROM TB_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PROFILE_INFO B ON B.IDX_USER=A.IDX_USER WHERE A.USER_STATUS=1 AND INSTR(A.USER_NAME, #searchTxt)>0 OR INSTR(A.USER_ID, #searchTxt)>0 ORDER BY A.IDX_USER
